episodesJson.title: SHORTS - Stonewall and Queer Pop Culture (with Matt Baume)
episodesJson.description: This week, as a supplement to our episode on Stonewall, we had the incomparable Matt Baume on to talk to us about queer representation both before and after the Stonewall riots. Join us as we learn about the history of queer portrayals in media, from anti-gay propaganda films up to that time Archie Bunker met a trans woman.
